fluidlogged.config.general.fluidloggable: Allows blocks that aren't normally fluidloggable to be so.
fluidlogged.config.fluid_permeability.en: Enables or disables fluid permeability that allows fluids to pass through blocks.
fluidlogged.config.fluid_permeability.fl: The list of blocks that allow fluids to pass through them unless a side is solid.
Note: The block must be fluidloggable in order to work.
fluidlogged.config.fluid_permeability.sh: The list of blocks that allow fluids to pass through them no matter the shape of the block.
Note: The block must be fluidloggable in order to work.
